Articles.Content:
Hi guys this is just my first week playing ksp but I thought I might post a challenge for fun. So her it is,

Build some type of aircraft launcher That can move on its own power and be able to launch a aircraft( the aircraft can use it own power to get in to orbit. The launcher just has to propel it into the air) into orbit. The aircraft has to be able to reenter the atmospher and be able to land on it's wheels.

RULES!!!!!!!!!!!

No modded part parts.

Stock parts only.

No program like Mechjeb, only the game physics and controls.

No decoupling except for when you decouple the plane from the spa plane launcher.

Any way have with this challeng and do include some pics or maybe a video and .craft fil

Have fun

Skylid
